title: A complex nox type.
description: Defines a complex nox type that includes simple types, objects, arrays and collections.

trait.title: The trait of the event. Contains no spaces.
trait.description: Assign a trait to the event that defines it's scope. PascalCase recommended.

name.title: The name of the attribute. Contains no spaces.
name.description: Assign a descriptive name to the attribute. Should be a singular noun and be unique within a collection of attributes. PascalCase recommended.

description.title: The description of the attribute.
description.description: A descriptive phrase that explains the nature and function of this attribute within a collection.

isRequired.title: Is the attribute required? Boolean value.
isRequired.description: Indicates whether this attribute is required within the collection. Defaults to false.

isReadonly.title: Is this attribute readonly? Boolean value.
isReadonly.description: Indicates whether this attribute is readonly. Defaults to false.

id.description: The Enum identifier. This value will be persisted with entities and should uniquely identify an entry.

enumerationTypeOptions.title: Options for the enum value type.
enumerationTypeOptions.description: Options to control the behaviour of the Enum nox type.

values.title: The optional default values for this Enum.
values.description: The default evalues of this Enum. These values will automatically be created and available in the domain.

id.title: The Id for the Enum.
id.description: The Enum identifier. This value will be persisted with entities and should uniquely identify an entry.

name.title: The friendly name of the Enum value. Contains no spaces.
name.description: The name in the default culture of the Enum identifier.

isLocalized.title: Whether the description of the Enum will be localizable.
isLocalized.description: Whether the description of the Enum will be localizable for the supported solution cultures

description.description: A descriptive phrase that explains the nature and function of this attribute within a collection.

isRequired.title: Is the attribute required? Boolean value.
isRequired.description: Indicates whether this attribute is required within the collection. Defaults to false.

isReadonly.title: Is this attribute readonly? Boolean value.
isReadonly.description: Indicates whether this attribute is readonly. Defaults to false.

trait.title: The trait of the event. Contains no spaces.
trait.description: Assign a trait to the event that defines it's scope. PascalCase recommended.
